maqras.text: dau che neah tae ke mindoeng te ryytha nowpel del avei nowknong phnaur trauv ke b po ch nh mk( daembi chomnoumchomreah)
ning avei del mean nowknong chetd( robsa mnoussa) nung trauv ke leatatradeang aoy kheunh yeang chbasa noh
pitabrakd nasa now thngai noh mcheasa robsa puokke doeng bamphot champoh ruengreav robsa puokke
a l k ri aah
tae a l k ri aah chea avei
tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha a l k ri aah chea avei noh
kuchea thngai del mnoussa lok brieb dauchchea hvaung satv meambaw del haer brasechabrasaeach
haey phnom teanglay brieb dauchchea romosatv del trauv ke thveu aoy baeng
haey rie anaknea del phnekachonhching robsa ke thngon( khang ampeula) noh
ku ke nung sthet knong karorsanow brakabdaoy kdei penh chetd(now knong thansuokr)
haey chamnek e anaknea del phnekachonhching robsa ke sral ( khang ampeula) noh
tilomnow robsa ke ku nork ha vi yah( rondawnork da chrow)
tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha vea chea avei noh
vea kuchea phleung nork da sen kdaw
pheap kraeutakratm nung pheap meanotropy sa mb tde ning kaunchaw cheachraen ban thveu aoy puok anak phe l ch khluon( pi karkorp brate b tde champoh a l laoh)
rhaut puok anak chaul tow knong phnaur( rhaut anak slab)
te. puok anak kngte nung doeng cheaminkhan
te. banteabmk puok anak kngte nung doeng
te. brasenbae puok anakdoeng( pi lotthophl nei kar phe l ch khluon robsa puok anak) daoy kar doeng yeang chbasaleasa noh( puok anak pitchea min thveu dauchnaoh laey)
chea karpit nasa puok anak nung kheunh nork cheu hi m cheaminkhan
banteabmk puok anak pitchea nung kheunh vea yeang chbasa nung phnek
kraoyomk puok anak nung trauv ke suor now thngai noh ampi nie k meat del trong ban bratan aoy puok anak
a l laoh sbath nung pelvelea
pitabrakd nasa mnoussa lok ku sthet ko n ng pheap khatabng
leuklengte banda anak del mean chomnue ning ban sang ampeu la troemotrauv ning ban phdephdam knea aoy brakean khchab nouv karpit ning ban phdephdam knea aoy meankar atthmot bonnaoh
vineasa a nd reay haey champoh anak niyeay muolobangkeach ning anak niyeay daem ke
kuchea anak del ban bramoul tropy sa mb tde ning reab chamnuon robsa vea
daoy ke kitthea tropy sa mb tde robsa ke pitchea thveu aoy ke now kngvongsa chea rieng haut
min dauchnaoh te. karpit ke nung trauv ke baoh banhchoul tow knong hou t mah
tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha hou t mah chea avei noh
kuchea phleung robsa a l laoh del ban bangkeat touk(nowknong nork)
del vea chabcheh real dl behdaung
pitabrakd nasa nork noh trauv ban bet chit daembi komaoy puokke chenh
trauv ban changophcheab nung sasar da veng
tae anak( mou ham meat) min bankheunh te ryytha mcheasa robsa anak ban thveu towleu krom tp damri yeang dauch me d ch
tae trong minban thveu aoy ubayokl akrak robsa puokke v nge vng ( breachy) te ryy
haey trong ban banhchoun baksaei teang hvaung tow brayoutth tatl nung puokke
puokvea tomleak towleu puokke daoy dom thm sai ch chchi l( del mk pi phleung nork)
ruochamk trong ban thveu aoy puokke brieb dauchchea sloekchheu del trauv dangkouv sai
chea tomleab nei kolosampnth kou r sh
tomleab robsa puokke ku kar thveudamnaer now rdauvornga r( daembi thveu chomnuonh now bratesa ye men) ning( now bratesa sha m) now rdauvokdaw
dau che neah chaur aoy puokke korp sakkar champoh mcheasa krobkrong kak hpeah nih choh
ku trong chea anak del ban phdal chamneiahar dl puokke daembi bambat nouv kar se r k khlean ning phdal sa ndi pheap dl puokke aoy chiesa phot pi karphyokhlach
tae anak( mou ham meat) bankheunh bokkol del bdeseth nung thngai chomnoumchomreah der ryyte
noh haey kuchea bokkol del baohbng kaunkamprea
haey min ch mrou nh knea aoy phdal chamneiahar dl anak kreikr
dau che neah pheap vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del sa la t
del puokke prongeuy k ndeu y champoh kar sa la t robsa puokke
puokke kuchea puok del sang ampeula daembi chng bangheanh aoy ke kheunh tebonnaoh
haey puokke min aoy tropy ke khchei laey saumbite b ndi ch b nduoch kadaoy
pitabrakd nasa yeung ban bratan aoy anak( mou ham meat) nouv a l ka v sae r( t ne l muoy nowknong thansuokr)
dau che neah chaur anak sa lat ning saamleh satv daembi mcheasa robsa anak choh
pitabrakd nasa anak del saabkhpaem anak( mou ham meat) ke nung trauv katphdach pi phl la( teang nowknong lokey ning barlok)
chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha ao puok del brachheang
khnhom min korp sakkar champoh avei del puok anak korp sakkar noh laey
haey puok anak ka minmen chea anak korp sakkar champoh avei del khnhom korp sakkar noh der
haey khnhom minmen chea anak del korp sakkar champoh avei del puok anak ban korp sakkar noh laey
haey puok anak ka minmen chea anak korp sakkar champoh avei del khnhom korp sakkar noh der
samreab puok anak ku sasanea robsa puok anak haey samreab khnhom ku sasanea robsakhnhom
nowpel del chomnuoy robsa a l laoh ning chychomneah ban mk dl( kar romdaoh tikrong mea kkah)
pelnoh anak nung kheunh mnoussaamna chaul sasanea robsa a l laoh teang krom
dau che neah chaur anak leukatamkeung daoy kar sarsaer tow champoh mcheasa robsa anak ning som aphytosa pi trong . pitabrakd nasa trong kuchea anak del ttuol yk kar som aphytosa bamphot
dai teangpir( tongveu) robsa a pou la hab ban vineasa a nd reay haey ke ka vineasa a nd reay
tropy sa mb tde robsa ke ning avei delke ban sang kanlongomk minban phdal phalobrayoch dl ke laey
ke nung chaul tow knong nork del mean andataphleung da santho santhow
haey phriyea robsa ke del chea anak yk banlea( reay leu phlauv daembi thveubeab mou ham meat) ka dauchnaoh der
now nung k robsa neang mean khsae chr vea k phleung
chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha a l laoh kuchea mcheasa temuoyokt
a l laoh kuchea anak del trauv ke pungpeak
trong minban brasaut botr laey haey trong ka min trauv ke brasaut der
haey kmean norna mneak briebabradauch nung trong laey
chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha khnhom som pi mcheasa krobkrong pel tiebaphlu aoy banhchiesa
ampi brakear akrak teanglay del trong ban bangkeut mk
ning ampi brakear akrak nei peloyb nowpel del pheap ngngut ban mokadl
ning ampi brakear akrak robsa puok sdrei m nd akm del sautr phlom m nd akm tow knong khsaechamnng
haeyning ampi brakear akrak robsa anak chranen chhneanisa nowpel delke chranen chhneanisa
chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha khnhom som pi mcheasa nei mnoussa lok
del chea se d ch krobkrong mnoussa lok
chea mcheasa nei mnoussa lok
aoy banhchiesa pi brakear akrak nei kar nhouhnhng robsa puok shai t n
del vea nhouhnhng nowknong chetd mnoussa lok
(shai t n noh) mk ampi chin ning mnoussa lok
